subject: World Cup (Skiing)
Olympic Games
lead_paragraph: Local favorites Max Blardone and Davide Simoncelli finished first and second in the giant slalom while Ted Ligety placed seventh, and Bode Miller failed to qualify for the second run.
snippet: Local favorites Max Blardone and Davide Simoncelli finished first and second in the giant slalom while Ted Ligety placed seventh, and Bode Miller failed to qualify for the second run.
